name: racerxfactor
headerTaglineOne: Hi I'm Rex, I'm based in Pasadena CA
headerTaglineTwo: Senior Product & UX Designer crafting intuitive experiences for digital products
aboutpara:
I'm the person who sits happily in the middle—the sweet spot where design meets code. I don't just build beautiful interfaces; I build them right. I love the challenge of taking a creative vision and translating it into clean, high-performing code that makes users go, "Wow, that was easy!" Essentially, I'm a hybrid builder, fluent in both the aesthetic and the technical, ensuring every project is functional, efficient, and visually compelling.

Outside of coding, my life is powered by a couple of non-screen passions (mostly). I'm a massive hockey fan and love being around that high-energy, fast-paced atmosphere. When I need to really switch off, I'm diving deep into a new world with video games on my days off. It’s my perfect way to balance intense focus with a bit of escapism and fun.

resume.tagline: UX UI Designer with Development Experience
resume.description: UI/UX Designer and brand specialist with 8+ years crafting visual identities and creative campaigns for tech and B2B SaaS. Developed scalable design systems and brand assets that boosted user retention by 40% and email engagement by 75%. Expert in Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, motion design and generative AI to enhance speed. Collaborative partner aligning creative output with strategic objectives to ensure cohesive brand impact.

experiences.bullets: Delivered end-to-end design solutions (graphic UI/UX motion) using Figma Adobe Creative Suite and generative AI tools enhancing digital presence and product usability., Defined and implemented brand guidelines improving consistency and user interaction across platforms for clients such as Better Angels Contractors Wardrobe and Ready Art Work.

Led UI/UX design strategy for a reward-based health and e-commerce app contributing to a 40% increase in user retention., Boosted marketing effectiveness by redesigning email campaigns achieving a 75% increase in open rates., Created a custom Airtable pipeline to align design-dev communication cutting rework by 90%., Established scalable design systems reducing design-to-dev handoff time by 50%., Conducted user research and A/B testing in collaboration with product and marketing stakeholders to iterate rapidly and validate design decisions.

education.universityPara: Computer Science Degree which is pretty much useless at this point
